OmniIntegrationProcedure.description: This IP to start the async process for bulk configuration for ESM QLIs

omniProcessElements.name: DeleteGroupCart

omniProcessElements.name: sendNotificationStartedForOrder
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "actionMessage" : "", "additionalInput" : { "body" : "You’ll be notified when the products for selected order line items of order %cartId% are bulk updated.", "customNotificationTypeName" : "ESMNotifications", "targetID" : "%cartId%", "title" : "Bulk updating started", "userID" : "= $Vlocity.UserId" }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "chainOnStep" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "disableChainable" : false, "executionConditionalFormula" : "%StartAsyncJobForBulkConfiguration:code% == 202 AND %cartType% == \"Order\"", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : { }, "integrationProcedureKey" : "ESM_SendAppNotification", "label" : "IntegrationProcedureAction1", "remoteOptions" : { }, "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "", "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : true, "show" : null, "useFormulas" : true }
